title: Bowl, ca. 1950
dimensions: H x diam.: 10.2 x 17.8 cm (4 x 7 in.)
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of American Institute of Interior Designers, New York Metropolitan Chapter
description: Bowl is of squared form with curved corners. Circular foot right supports flared oval undulating bowl, which tapers outward toward plain lip. Overall pattern on body walls of three-leaf motif, pierced through body and filled with translucent glaze in "riceware" technique.

tombstone.epitaph:
Bowl, ca. 1950.
ca. 1950. porcelain. Museum purchase through gift of American Institute of Interior Designers, New York Metropolitan Chapter. 1982-70-1.
